results.title: Protective effect of simvastatin and VULM 1457 in ischaemic-reperfused myocardium of the diabetic-hypercholesterolemic rats.
results.text_hl: This study examined the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (10 mg/ kg) and @CHEMICAL_VULM_1457 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C505646 @@@VULM 1457@@@ (50 mg/kg), an ACAT inhibitor, in the heart model of 6 min @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ followed by 10 min @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@reperfusion injury@@@ in the @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic-hypercholesterolaemic@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hypochondroplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562937 @@@DM-HCH@@@) @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Adameová A, Kuzelová M, Faberová V, Svec P. Protective effect of simvastatin and VULM 1457 in ischaemic-reperfused myocardium of the diabetic-hypercholesterolemic rats. Pharmazie. 2006 Sep;61(9):807-8. PMID: 17020164
